snippet: Kevin Youkilis’s Boston Red Sox teammates came to his defense Monday after Manager Bobby Valentine questioned his commitment to the game and then apologized for the comments.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Boston Red Sox lose to the Tampa Bay Rays, 1-0; Boston third baseman Kevin Youkilis’s teammates come to his defense after manager Bobby Valentine questioned his commitment to the game and then apologized for the comments; other baseball scores noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and JULIET MACUR

lead_paragraph: Kevin Youkilis’s Boston Red Sox teammates came to his defense Monday after Manager Bobby Valentine questioned his commitment to the game and then apologized for the comments.

headline.seo: Bobby Valentine Apologizes For Criticizing Kevin Youkilis
headline.main: Valentine Issues an Apology for His Criticism of Youkilis
headline.print_headline: Valentine Issues an Apology For His Criticism of Youkilis
